bullets: Scaled ECG cloud services to 10x throughput while meeting FDA Part 11 controls.

Drove reliability OKRs with chaos drills and golden-path monitoring dashboards.
Built QMS + ERP suite used by 4 global manufacturing sites.
Implemented SOC2 + HIPAA practices with privacy-by-design architectural reviews.
Created analytics pipelines translating device telemetry into actionable ops alerts.
Developed arrhythmia detection services with cardiology SMEs.
Automated test harnesses for BLE peripherals and ECG signal validation.
Shipped first cloud-native release enabling remote patient monitoring.
